metadata.title: CVE-2021-28278 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists in jhead 3.04 and 3.05via the RemoveSectionType function in jpgfile.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28278` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.06.0.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.06.0.1-2').
